resources.string: Welcome to the Sound Meter App!
Things to know before using the app:

-the measurements made by this app are only approximations of the volume level

 -the microphone in mobile devices is not suitable for accurate measurements - specialized equipment is needed for this

 -before first use, the app needs to be calibrated - this is ideally done using certified volume measuring device

 -however for simple estimation of sound level, the app can be calibrated in following way:
Before first use, calibration is needed
